Title: What is ngx-docs?
Description: ngx-docs is a template application built with angular 12 that helps you create web-documentations for anything you like, hussle free!

Title: Input.json file
Description: The input.json file is the file responsible for bringing your data inside the application environment.
text: The input file is json formatted, you can read more at the attached url
code:

items: The following is a list of the acceptable values
Examples and usage can be found on the ngx-docs github page

Title: settings.json file
Description: The settings json file is responsible for the visual settings you want to apply to your documentation.
text: The following is a list of all possible options, keep in mind all of them are optional and if something is missing it will be reverted to its default.

Title: Choosing template pages
Description: Switching through template pages can easily be done by modyfing the app-routing.module.ts
code:
const routes: Routes = [
  { path: '', component: HomeTwoComponent },
  { path: 'view/undefined', redirectTo: '', pathMatch: 'full' },
  { path: 'view/:id', component: DetailedPageOneComponent },
  { path: 'album/undefined', redirectTo: '', pathMatch: 'full' },
  { path: 'album/:id', component: AlbumPageComponent },

  { path: '**', component: HomeOneComponent }, // This line will remain down from the whole pages component list
];
items: You only have to edit the Routes array

Title: Project information
Description: The following is a list of all available npm modules that already exist in the project.
text: Keep in mind that the base of the styles is bootstrap, making it a must have module.
